body:
Hello,

Could we have a demo for a pr?

Is configured like this
If the connection is not available, please test the HadoopUtilsTest under cn.escheduler.common.utils under the separate commons module in IDEA, and put the configuration file under resources.

是这样配置的
如果连接不上，请单独在IDEA中单独commons模块下cn.escheduler.common.utils下的HadoopUtilsTest测试，配置文件放到resources下

Which version?
In theory, there is no such problem, support the same user to log in multiple places, if there are still problems, you can take a screenshot

哪个版本？
理论上是没有这个问题的，支持同一个用户多处登录，如果还有问题，可以截图

Exiting the account means clicking the "Exit" button on the user?
If this is the case, the session is invalidated and deleted. The login of the same user elsewhere will also exit. This is no problem.

退出账号，是指点击了用户上的“退出”按钮了吗？
如果是这样，是将session失效，删除了，同一个用户其它地方的登录也会退出，这是没有问题的

Our permission granularity is really thick
For the authorization of resources, data sources, projects, and UDFs, even if they are granted to others, other people currently have only read and write permissions and no delete permissions. Delete permissions can only be deleted by the owner and administrator

我们的权限粒度确实比较粗
对于资源、数据源、项目和UDF的授权，就算授予给的其它人，其它人目前也只有读、写权限，没有删除权限。删除权限只有所有者和管理员才可以删除
#854 fix this bug
OK，we will improve this feature for dev branch

May be occupied by the port
Remove nohup, then open the master_logback.xml STDOUT console output, take a look at the log output

可能是端口占用了
去掉nohup，然后打开master_logback.xml STDOUT控制台输出，执行一下看看日志输出

When the worker executes, it checks whether there is this tenant on Linux, that is, the corresponding user on linux, whether it exists, if it does not exist, it is created, and the tenant (the corresponding user on linux) exists with sudo -u tenant sh xxx .command for task submission

会在worker执行的时候，检查linux上是否存在此租户，也就是对应的linux上的用户，是否存在，不存在则创建，存在则用此租户（linux上对应的用户）sudo -u 租户 sh xxx.command进行任务提交
Ok, I am also very welcome to contribute this feature.

version 1.1.0
yes ,i click the "Exit" button
i think this strategy is not reasonable which will bring inconvenience to account-sharing

是1.1.0版本
是点击“退出”
这种策略，我觉得是不合理的。会对帐号共享开发造成不便

OK, we will consider the Spark and MR task multi-version problem solution, and we are very welcome to contribute this feature.

我们会考虑Spark和MR任务多版本问题解决方案，也非常欢迎能贡献此功能
i hope new version coming soon.

Is export JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME Can't find JAVA_HOME?

是 export JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME 找不到JAVA_HOME吗？
please read https://github.com/apache/incubator-dolphinscheduler/blob/dev/CONTRIBUTING.md doc

The log is not generated. It may be that the worker_logback.xml is not configured. If you use IDEA to start, please merge master_logback.xml and worker_logback.xml into logback.xml, and then start.
The task is not successful, see the worker log output above: process kill failed, process id: 0, task id: 4913, process id is 0 is wrong, the process id can not be 0, this needs to be positioned

日志没有生成，可能是worker_logback.xml没有配置对，如果使用IDEA启动的，请将master_logback.xml和worker_logback.xml融合到logback.xml中，然后启动
任务没有kill成功，看你上面的worker日志输出：process kill failed, process id :0, task id:4913，process id 是 0 是不对了，进程id不能是0，这个需要定位一下

Re-do the soft connection

重新做一下软连接

Organization: tianque
Location: Hangzhou
Contact: w771920097@qq.com
Scenario: for big data task scheduling

------------

组织：tianque
地点：杭州
联系方式：w771920097@qq.com
场景：用于大数据任务调度

> Is export JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME Can't find JAVA_HOME?
> 
> 是 export JAVA_HOME=$JAVA_HOME 找不到JAVA_HOME吗？

是的,这里获取不到ssh机器的环境变量。需要在使用JAVA_HOME前面，source一下

> The log is not generated. It may be that the worker_logback.xml is not configured. If you use IDEA to start, please merge master_logback.xml and worker_logback.xml into logback.xml, and then start.
> The task is not successful, see the worker log output above: process kill failed, process id: 0, task id: 4913, process id is 0 is wrong, the process id can not be 0, this needs to be positioned
> 
> 日志没有生成，可能是worker_logback.xml没有配置对，如果使用IDEA启动的，请将master_logback.xml和worker_logback.xml融合到logback.xml中，然后启动
> 任务没有kill成功，看你上面的worker日志输出：process kill failed, process id :0, task id:4913，process id 是 0 是不对了，进程id不能是0，这个需要定位一下

我在想是不是日志没有生成的原因就是这个进程没有启动？process id 是0也是这个原因。
是什么原因会造成进程没有启动还不知道。
is there any plan for this feature?  i think Supplement Data per hour is important to many users,  or we must run a workflow and wait, then run the next workflow,  for many times.

我发现可以在保存的时候修改名称，但是还是希望可以点击名称直接修改。
i found i can change flow's name when i save it. however,i still hope i can change it easier by click the "name".

When I switch to script and start is OK by script

shell  /usr/jdk64/jdk1.8.0_112/bin/java -Dspring.config.location=conf/application_master.properties  -classpath /data/dolphin/bin/../conf:/data/dolphin/bin/../lib/* cn.escheduler.server.master.MasterServer
which browser do you use?

> which browser do you use?

edge, win10
@LoveEvenWong

> @LoveEvenWong

This means that you can kill a process with "yarn application - kill" instead of killing a process
it's not a bug
soga   thank u
Hello, I want to implement this feature

i tested this question,no need to re-quote the sub-flow
测试过，不需要

Hi,@buildupchao 
Maybe you know, DolphinScheduler need start with a user that have sudo permissions. Because DolphinScheduler is support multi-tenant . In DolphinScheduler every task need be run as the tenant . So ,  DolphinScheduler need use 'sudo su - {tenant} -c ' to run the task script . 

For those users who are unable to obtain sudo privileges due to company security reasons, we recommend that you apply for a user with sudo privileges. After deployment, the password is given by Operator K.
good job！ @lgcareer

for now， we have task copy like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15833811/65505509-f4661880-defb-11e9-9cc2-f343777fc328.png)

can this solve your problem? 

please update/add description in English for better global communication, thx!
please update/add  title and description in English for better global communication, thx!
pr #858 repair this issue!
good idea!
good job!

we will consider this feature in the future! thx! 
for now ,we don't have enough time to do this!
please udpate/add title and description in English for better global communication!

good idea!
could you submit a pr to implement this feature?
which service?
master server?

good idea!
could you submit a pr to solve this?

This is possible in the same workflow, but we hope that the new task node will take effect in all workflows.

---

这在同一个工作流里是可行的，但我们希望新建的任务节点能在所有工作流里生效

how to run? 
do you have logback.xml in the service[for example: escheduler-server] resource directory？
please update/add title use English for better global communication!
> 怎么跑？ > 服务[例如：escheduler-server]资源目录中是否有logback.xml？ run with IDEA, yes, ![1569374098717](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45529589/65561432-00da8780-df75-11e9-889b-40ebc0362039.jpg)

> please update/add title and description in English for better global communication, thx!



> please update/add title and description in English for better global communication, thx!

Updated

> I also had the same problem with the `1.0.4 release` distribution at first, so I compiled a `dev` version and the same problem occurred.
> 
> 我一开始使用 `1.0.4 release` 发行版也出现同样的问题，所以我有编译了一个 `dev` 版的，结果也出现同样的问题。

请问是如何解决的这个问题呢？

> I also encountered the same problem, I don't know how to solve it.
> 
> 我也遇到同样的问题，不知道怎么解决

最后有解决吗？
So cool! This problem will not occur in the next version?

> Hi,@buildupchao
> Maybe you know, DolphinScheduler need start with a user that have sudo permissions. Because DolphinScheduler is support multi-tenant . In DolphinScheduler every task need be run as the tenant . So , DolphinScheduler need use 'sudo su - {tenant} -c ' to run the task script .
> 
> For those users who are unable to obtain sudo privileges due to company security reasons, we recommend that you apply for a user with sudo privileges. After deployment, the password is given by Operator K.

Ok. Thanks for you help!
please update/add title and description in English for better global communication! thx!

good idea！thx！
I see this idea has been done，we close this issue，haha
good

please add my wechat: 510570367,  there are some other things to discuss!  I can't unify github id and wechat.  when add me，please tell me you are "LoveEvenWong", because too many people add! thank you !
good job！ thank you!
submit a pr please!
ok Submitted

which version do you use?
version 1.1.0, HadoopUtils.java  line number 322 :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15833811/65594926-407d8f80-dfc6-11e9-8d4e-c5544d4acf65.png)

> which version do you use?
> version 1.1.0, HadoopUtils.java line number 322 :
> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15833811/65594926-407d8f80-dfc6-11e9-8d4e-c5544d4acf65.png)

Yes, I use version 1.1.0. I got this package from latest release link 'https://github.com/apache/incubator-dolphinscheduler/releases'. The screen shoot of installation package as below:
![es_installation_package](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25910406/65599312-2b0d6300-dfd0-11e9-882e-63275f81cb79.png)

Of course, I de-compiler the runtime-class by arthas jad command, then get different code of line 322 of HadoopUtils.java. Please look at:
![jad_source_code_op](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25910406/65601033-e97eb700-dfd3-11e9-903a-647abc9d87be.png)
![jad_source_code](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25910406/65601034-ea174d80-dfd3-11e9-8327-bbf9d44c530b.png)

As a result, I don't know what happened.

could you submit a pr to solve this?

1, sudo: unable to initialize policy plugin
#For example, the deployment user is an escheduler account.
Esceduler ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: NOPASSWD: ALL

#and need to comment out the Default requiretty line
#Default requiretty


2, this problem has been verified in the front and rear of release 1.1.0 this tenant code
Note: The tenant code corresponds to the linux user name, please specify the name

1，sudo: unable to initialize policy plugin
#例如部署用户是escheduler账号
escheduler  ALL=(ALL)       NOPASSWD: NOPASSWD: ALL

#并且需要注释掉 Default requiretty 一行
#Default requiretty


2，这个问题在release 1.1.0 中前后端已经校验了这个租户编码
注意：租户编码对应的是linux用户名称，请规范命名
I want to fix this bug by renaming the workflow to another name, like:  xxx-copy

There is no such problem with normal operation.

Is there any question now?

This problem generally does not exist with directories. I think you and directories exist. Is it that HDFS is not enabled in the middle, and then HDFS is started?

Or try creating a new tenant upload resource

正常操作是没有这个问题的
现在还有这个问题吗？
这个问题一般都是跟目录不存在，我看你跟目录是存在的是，是中间先是hdfs没有启用，之后启动hdfs的吗？
或者你试试创建一个新的租户上传资源

失败策略不是这样理解的，是对于并行任务，如果有失败的，并行任务是继续执行还是要Kill掉
Failure strategy is not so understood. It's about parallel tasks. If they fail, do parallel tasks continue or Kill them out?

> There is no such problem with normal operation.
> 
> Is there any question now?
> 
> This problem generally does not exist with directories. I think you and directories exist. Is it that HDFS is not enabled in the middle, and then HDFS is started?
> 
> Or try creating a new tenant upload resource
> 
> 正常操作是没有这个问题的
> 现在还有这个问题吗？
> 这个问题一般都是跟目录不存在，我看你跟目录是存在的是，是中间先是hdfs没有启用，之后启动hdfs的吗？
> 或者你试试创建一个新的租户上传资源

No, HDFS is always running. I'll give you feedback after I create a new tenant and test.
Can you assign this issue to me？

I've fixed it. I'll submit it it later.

> 失败策略不是这样理解的，是对于并行任务，如果有失败的，并行任务是继续执行还是要Kill掉
> Failure strategy is not so understood. It's about parallel tasks. If they fail, do parallel tasks continue or Kill them out?



> 失败策略不是这样理解的，是对于并行任务，如果有失败的，并行任务是继续执行还是要Kill掉
> Failure strategy is not so understood. It's about parallel tasks. If they fail, do parallel tasks continue or Kill them out?

串行化流程的策略设置中，没有相应的忽略此节点的失败的策略，我怎么满足上述需求呢？
In the policy setting of serialization process, there is no corresponding strategy to ignore the failure of this node. How can I meet the above requirements?
I replaced a machine deployment and found that it could be deployed successfully. You can try it.
these changes are to solve the problem which  zk worker & server list not show in front ?
ok

Do dolphinscheduler support project owners to share projects with others instead of administrators?
--------------
是否支持项目所有者分享项目给其他人看而不是管理员分配？
